SELECT * FROM ( SELECT (ROW_NUMBER() OVER()) AS RNUM, A.*, B.user_name FROM ( SELECT question_seq, title, reg_dt, reg_usr, mod_dt, mod_usr, lang_type FROM tb_question
title LIKE '%'||#{KEYWORD}||'%'

select currval('sq_tb_question') as question_seq

mapper.update: UPDATE tb_question SET title = #{title}, con_question = #{con_question}, con_io = #{con_io}, con_example = #{con_example}, con_hint = #{con_hint}, con_etc = #{con_etc}, test_code = #{test_code}, mod_usr = #{mod_usr}, mod_dt = now(), lang_type = #{lang_type}, timeout = cast(#{timeout} as integer), max_codesize = cast(#{max_codesize} as integer), ban_keyword = #{ban_keyword} WHERE question_seq = cast(#{question_seq} as integer)
